mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS id, r.from_currency_id AS fromCurrencyId, t1.name AS fromCurrency, r.to_currency_id AS toCurrencyId, t2.name AS toCurrency, r.rate AS rate, r.date AS `date`, r.created_time AS createdTime, r.last_modified_time AS lastModifiedTime FROM t_rate r LEFT JOIN t_currency t1 ON r.from_currency_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN t_currency t2 ON r.to_currency_id = t2.id WHERE r.from_currency_id = #{fromCurrencyId} AND r.to_currency_id = #{toCurrencyId} AND r.date = #{date}
